text: Hukm ʙar in ast, har kas sitam kunad, ʙaroi u coiz ast, ʙa andozae, ki ʙa u sitam sudaast, ʙar cinojatkor sitam namojad ʙa'd az on cinojatkor ʙar u duʙora sitam kunad, ʙa durusti, ki Alloh sitamdidaro jorias xohad kard. Ba durusti, ki Alloh afvkunanda va omurzanda ast gunahkoronro, favran ʙa gunohason azoʙ namedihad va az gunohason darmeguzarad
